<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 2"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Relentless Stalker](/Feats.aspx?ID=867) <actions string="Reaction" />
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from The Fall of Plaguestone</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Move" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=114" />
<trait label="Ranger" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=136" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [The Fall of Plaguestone](/Sources.aspx?ID=3) pg. 57</row>

**Trigger**
An adjacent creature you are hunting attempts to move away from you using an action that has the move trait.

</column>

---

Your hunted prey cannot escape your relentless pursuit. [Stride](/Actions.aspx?ID=88) up to your Speed in tandem with the triggering creature, remaining adjacent to the foe throughout its movement until it stops moving or you run out of movement. You can ignore difficult terrain during this movement unless the difficult terrain is caused by a magical effect.

<title level="2">Noala's Training</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [The Fall of Plaguestone](/Sources.aspx?ID=3) pg. 56</row>

By aiding an NPC from The Fall of Plaguestone, the PCs can learn some special woodland survival techniques.

**Related Feats**: [Wilderness Spotter](/Feats.aspx?ID=868)
name: Relentless Stalker
